text: Ezɨ gɨn atrivim ua mɨdorozir gumazibar dapanir igharazir mam ko an mɨdorozir gumazir 50pla amangizɨ, me Elaija bagha ua ghu. Egha namba 3ɨn gumazir dapanir kam ghua mɨghsɨamɨn ghuavanaga, Elaijan boroghɨra tevimning apɨrigha, kamaghɨn an azara, “O Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazim, ga uaning, nɨ nan ikɨrɨmɨrim ko nan mɨdorozir gumazibar ikɨrɨmɨribar apangkuvightɨ, e nɨn damazimɨn bizir aghuimɨn mɨn otoghtɨ, nɨ e gasɨghasɨghan markɨ.
